title: Rhubarb tarts with rhubarb ice cream
description: NB. For this recipe, you will need an ice cream maker.
ingredients: 450g/1lb rhubarb stems, trimmed, cut into 5cm/2in pieces
1 vanilla pod, split, seeds scraped out using a knife
800g/1¾lb rhubarb stems, trimmed, cut into 5cm/2in pieces (1cm/½in thick)
1 vanilla pod, split, seeds scraped out using a knife
5 free-range egg yolks, plus 1 free-range egg, beaten
